title: Jhin theory; GROUNDBREAKING NEVER BEFORE THOUGHT OF, BACKED UP BY FACTS
body:
So we all know that "Jhin the Deadeye" has been hyped as the new champion for a while but I just found a striking piece of evidence in the teasers that everyone I have seen so far has overlooked. This is ABSOLUTELY gamechanging and I can't believe no one has discovered this yet! Its making me giddy to share it with you.

Ok, so Jhin's first target was Zed.
Zed is how European culture pronounces the letter "Z".

Z is the 26th letter.

Zed reverse the way of the ninja order, and is able to divide himself.

If we reverse 26, we get 62, now we divide 6 and 2.

6/2 = 3.

There are three sides of a triangle. 

Zed was shot in the eye.

Triangle + Eye = Illuminati.

{{item:2050}} {{champion:238}} {{item:2050}}

But what's this, there's more!

Vi was another target of Jhin

Vi stands for 6 is roman numerals

Vi has two letters in her name

6/2 = 3

CONSPIRACY CONFIRMED

{{item:2050}} {{champion:254}} {{item:2050}}

Wait a minute.

Zed = 3 as we saw previously.
Vi = 6.
Three 6s...

666.

Demon Vi. 
Fire came from Vi in the teaser.
Demon Fire from hell.

Vi = 2 letters
Zed = 3 letters
Jhin = 4 letters

....

Teemo = 5 letters = Demon

Just how long does this go?!!

Sona
S=19
O=15
N=14
A=1

19x15x14x1=3990  

3990/3=1330 which is close to 1337 in LeetSpeak but isn't because Sona can't speak

papyrus? O_O

Okay I fell for it. But actually I have a theory myself. Jhin is a perfectionist. He is obviously delusional and wants everything to be perfect, therefore he sees everything he does is beautiful, whether death or killing he sees it as a work of art. However due to his state of mind he sees himself as ugly, which is why he wears a mask, he wants to hide the fact that he's nothing like what he imagines everything to be.
So I have a theory according to this.
He's an assassain. Zed is a huge problem in Ionia due to disrupting and overthrowing the philosophy of balance. He's a threat, a huge one. Garen is a Demacian, who is in love with a Noxian. A Demacian, a public figure who leads with strength and justice in love with a person who is league with their mortal enemy. Sona a terrific musician with a magical Ethwal. Obviously someone who is jealous and wants the Ethwal for themselves. Vi, a huge threat to criminals. It wouldn't be uncommon for criminals to hire people to kill others. However Jhin won't take just any case, he takes cases where he can do some poetic justice as well as making their deaths beautiful and perfected. After all beauty comes from poetic justice.
Zed? A ninja who became evil and wants to throw balance because he saw a box? Perfect! Shoot him in the eyes and make him perfect!
Garen? A Demacian who shouts DEMACIA? Ehh normal. But a Demacian who's heart is captured by the enemy? Shoot him in the heart and he'll be a perfect victim!
Sona? A mute who can play a magical instrument beautifully? Beautiful, shoot her in the throat and take her Ethwal. Now she seems perfect, no flaws.
Vi? A criminal turned officer because of some gauntlets? Shoot her then burn her body! That way she's perfect! No trace she was anything else!
His twisted mind sees this as perfection. A person who is normal no complications, take them away what made them well them and be the only perfect one in the world.

Please keep parodies outside of this discussion.

Try to be a bit mature?

I'm sorry let me fix that. Umm uhh. Zed plus Garen plus Sona plus Vi equals 15. 15 is the year Jhin was first teased. There were 5 teasers for him making 15/5=3. 3 like a triangle. And not there's only 1 purchasable eye Ward thing. Illuminati confirmed.
Actually Zed+Garen+Sona+Vi=14
Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.

I was looking at it similar to you but I was looking at it like a world war 2 kind of thing where he wants the champions of league to be perfect and kills those he's deemed has flaws... So he takes out the flawed champions to get his "perfect society" but the more I thought about it the more unrealistic it probably is because I doubt riot would make a Hitler like character

So what you are saying is...

He is going to shoot Katarina's heart next!
So heartseeker Jhin skin confirmed?

For real though, however much I would love him to be an assassin, I am almost positive that he is a marksman. This is because look at who he killed. Garen (top), Vi (Jungle), Zed (Mid), Sona (support). Just saying. I'm pretty sure he will be an adc, or this is just a crazy random happenstance.
... ADC assassin that benefits from the Assassins Blade item with the Nightfall perk... and you thought Rengar deletes people fast.
He also had a gun in the video so its almost guaranteed to be an adc not to mention the champion theory where he killed a top/jgl/sup/mid and an adc is what's left

Well a gun doesn't necessarily mean adc. Remember, Kindred has a bow, but she is not an adc. She is a "marksman" and I think the joke doesn't apply as much anymore because riot is actually putting ranged champs in different roles.

That's true but I wouldn't think they would make 2 marksman champions so close and one not be an adc... Also its been awhile since ones been released for the sole purpose of bot lane... Last one I believe was Kalista which has been sometime... So I believe that there is a 99% chance its a bot lane adc but you are correct though
Yeah i totally agree. Jhin will be an ADC.

I'm actually pretty excited for him because its similar to Lucian where he has pistol "even thou Lucians guns aren't pistols" but the spells are what really has me intrigued... I think its going to be a Ice, wind, earth, and fire type thing based on the champions icons... Because Zeds could be considered earth hence the flower petals, Sona wind because of the butterflies, Garen with the shards that look like ice, and Vi which looks like her gloves are on fire
Did you watch the Redmercy video too?
Na, I actually haven't even though I do watch him sometimes... Its  just something I came up with after pondering everything for a bit... Does he talk about the ice wind earth and fire though?
Yeah that's his theory too. Pretty big League youtuber. Mains Zed. Really cool guy. Informative yet funny. Here is a link to his video. https://youtu.be/duHxST9SIY8

I'll agree that he's very much a marksman.

But while we players usually designate marksman for bot lane, Riot doesn't always necessarily balance an ADC just to go bot lane and continue to dominate that meta. They failed with Mordekaiser, but seem to have reasonable success with Quinn.
No i totally agree that you can take marksman other places. Just saying that I think they  are putting him into the ADC category, not necessarily only go adc with him.
I also hoped it would be an assassin but facts are emplying otherwise ahhh who cares ill still play him mid and win some good matches xD
Thats the spirit! Remember, anyone can go mid if you try hard enough!

So he had killed everyone but the marksman on the ENEMY team.  So then how does this make him the marksman?  The killer of those 4 could be any position on the other team.

Your logic is flawed
How do we know they were the enemy...? They could've trusted him and ended up dead. Just saying.
brace the shadows find the truth

But wait. there is more. order now and we will doub........ CUT.

Garen has 5 letters. 

5/2 = 2.5

+ 0.5 = 3

I actually said something somewhat similar but got my number a bit different... A lot of people were speculating the zed has 3 sona has 4 garen has 5 and vi is 6 and deadeye is 7, so I added 7+4=11 and 6+5=11 then you subtract those 2 which leaves you guessed it 3... what has 3 sides, a triangle.... whos represented by a triangle the illuminati!!!!
Illuminati everywhere
